description: This file contains styles for a web application, defining CSS variables for theme management and various styles for app components including buttons, headers, and responsive layouts.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application layout styling, includes background color, text alignment, and transition effects.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the main logo, including size and animation effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, positioning, and visual effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including position, background color, and hover effects.
